description: This file defines a ViewModel class named CategoriesViewModel used for observing and manipulating categories within an Android application. It interacts with a repository and database to perform add and delete operations on category data.

classes.name: CategoriesViewModel
classes.description: A ViewModel class that manages category data, allowing addition and deletion of categories while observing changes via LiveData.

methods.name: addCategory
methods.description: Adds a new category with the specified name to the repository, running the operation on a background thread.

methods.name: deleteCategory
methods.description: Deletes the specified category from the repository on a background thread.
